h2. Create Desktop Bucket

{{html:
<form class="form-horizontal" method="get" action="My Desktop Buckets" ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="CreateDesktopBucketController">
<fieldset>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Project Name</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="bucket.projectName">    
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Add User</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <div class="input-append">
      <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-xlarge" placeholder="e-mail" type="email" ng-model="bucket.newUser.email">
      <button>Add</button>
    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="radios">Select User Type</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-0">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="User" ng-model="bucket.newUser.userType">
      User
    </label>
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-1">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="Administrator" ng-model="bucket.newUser.userType">
      Administrator
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Choose Storage</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <div class="input-append">
      <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="140 GB" type="number" ng-model="bucket.storage">
      <span class="add-on">GB</span>
    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Data Locations</label>
  {{include:region_list}}
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext"># MS Office Licenses</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <div class="input-append">
      <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="5" type="number" ng-model="bucket.numOfficeLicenses">
    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext"># MS Office Full Licenses</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <div class="input-append">
      <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="0" type="number" ng-model="bucket.numFullOfficeLicenses">
    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="singlebutton"></label>
  <div class="controls">
    <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-primary" ng-click="create()">Create Desktop Bucket</button>
  </div>
</div>

</fieldset>
</form>

}}
